review: Met all my expectation plus more. I'm very glad I purchased it.  My main reason for getting it was that my existing home system supported Amazon Instant Video but did not support Closed Captions. The Amazon Fire TV does.The voice search is very handy and you can also filter by Prime only, which I didn't expect. I use the unit more than I expected when I first ordered it. It worked right out of the box. the only trouble I've had is after about a week the voice search stopped working and it would not go into sleep mode by itself. Amazon tech support cleared that up by having me unplug the unit and plug it back in (reboot?). Is has worked flawlessly for a couple of months now.
